title: Web Developer Portfolio
description: This is the website you are looking at right now! I coded this portfolio as a SPA with a router using Vue.js, SCSS, Bootstrap 5.2, with the addition of background animations using tsParticles.

title: Cave Monster Slayer - 2D Game Engine
description: University project in 2019 for a Computer Science class. I drew the images/animations myself, and programmed the entire game engine in C++ using the SDL library to render images and play sounds.
